title: Need to Order resistors
message:
Hi Im working on a 820-3437. R5475 4.53k
This is a non current sensing resistor?
Need to replace some resistors. Probably blew away don't know.
I assume I should order from mouser?
Does anyone have their part number?
Thanks

title: Need to Order resistors
message: Just stock up on parts boards. You'll get annoyed having to order resistors of all types/sizes/measurements/packages. Just spend $100 on parts boards, which should get you 3-4 good boards with 95% of the parts you'll need.

title: Need to Order resistors
message:
Agreed but to much trouble to search a board for the right part and again and again. I need several of this resistor so easier to replace the most common ones with a new one.
Use the boards for when I just need 1 part. 
Thanks for your info much appreciated

title: Need to Order resistors
message:
If you really want to order from mouser:
They are surface mount resistor, you can use mouser filter and specify the ohm value, the package, power rating and a suitable tolerance, you can find these parameters on the schematic.

title: Need to Order resistors
message:
Hi Jadao,
Thanks for the info.
I didn't see the part I was looking for on Louis's site and Louis recommended them in one of his video's as a source.
